title: 14704 E 2nd Ave #E110 - Aurora - 5 min to Town Center of Aurora!
posting_body: ['TEXT', 'show contact info', 'NOW FOR MORE INFO!', 'VIRTUAL TOUR: 14704 E 2nd Ave #E110', 'AREA: AURORA!', 'FEATURES:', 'This unit comes with laminate floors throughout the entire unit, a fireplace (decorative, cannot be used by tenants), and French doors inside the bedroom that lead to the outside patio area.', '**Per the HOA: Satellite dishes MUST be within the airspace of your deck or patio.', 'Satellite dishes outside of those boundaries will be removed.', 'All grills (gas, charcoal, and wood-burning) and smokers are prohibited from being used at this complex.', '**', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES: Water and trash removal!', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All other utilities not above paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 2 Bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED:', 'Dishwasher, garbage disposal, refrigerator, microwave, stove, oven.', 'LAUNDRY: Washer and dryer hookups.', 'FLOORING: Laminate flooring throughout the entire unit!', 'HEAT/COOLING: Window AC unit with baseboard heating.', 'PARKING: 2 Assigned outdoor parking spots #183 & #263.', 'FENCING:', 'N/A.', 'BASEMENT: N/A.', 'PETS: Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry', 'but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult!', 'AVAILABILITY DATE: September 5th!!', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June 2023.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.']
